name: YbFP15
comment: unpublished data from Koerner et al., Measurement of temperature-dependent absorption and emission spectra of Yb:YAG, Yb:LuAG, and Yb:CaF2 between 20C and 200C and predictions on their influence on laser performance, 2012, density and refractive index taken from lasermaterials.info from Mathias Siebold
